snippet.title: THRONE AND LIBERTY Open Beta / Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
THRONE AND LIBERTY Open Beta July 18th - 23rd. 

Experience guild-based combat on a massive scale, immerse yourself in a vast, seamless, and ever-changing world, gather your guild and forge your path to glory. The choice is yours on how you claim the throne. 

Prepare for battle in Solisium with one of our Early Access Packs and get a jump start with 5 days early access to the game at launch, along with exclusive rewards including premium outfits, morphs, amitoi, and more. 

Don’t miss your chance to be a part of the Open Beta and the Early Access and shape the future of THRONE AND LIBERTY.

Learn more at https://www.playthroneandliberty.com

Steam: https://bit.ly/3ScIrh5
Sony: https://bit.ly/4bIFVWT
Microsoft: https://bit.ly/3XZZDu5

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL 
X: https://X.com/playtlgame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playthroneandliberty 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/playthroneandliberty
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@playthroneandliberty
